product_summary: Good Tape is a secure transcription service for interview tapes. It offers instant transcription, secure file sharing, and automatic transcription. Good Tape is designed to make the transcription process faster, easier, and more secure.

product_usecases.details: Good Tape can be used by journalists to transcribe interviews, speeches, and other audio recordings.
Good Tape can be used by researchers to transcribe focus groups, surveys, and other qualitative data.
Good Tape can be used by students to transcribe lectures, interviews, and other educational materials.
Good Tape can be used by businesses to transcribe meetings, conference calls, and other business-related audio recordings.
Good Tape can be used by individuals to transcribe personal recordings, such as family interviews or travelogues.

product_toolfor.details: Good Tape is a valuable tool for transcriptionists who want to improve their productivity and accuracy.
Good Tape can help researchers to save time and effort when transcribing qualitative data.
Good Tape can help journalists to quickly and easily transcribe interviews and other audio recordings.
Good Tape can help students to improve their understanding of lectures and other educational materials.
Good Tape can help businesses to improve their communication and collaboration by providing accurate and timely transcriptions of meetings and other audio recordings.

product_pricing: Good Tape offers a free plan that allows users to transcribe up to 30 minutes of audio per month. Paid plans start at $10 per month and allow users to transcribe up to 60 minutes of audio per month.
